title: The Kaep Caper Edition
description:
Nike and Kaepernick, Les Moonves & Warner Bros, and Modi’s failed cash crackdownon this week's episode with Felix Salmon, Anna Szymanski, and Emily Peck, 
In the Slate Plus segment, Felix, Anna, and Emily discuss Amazon’s new valuation. 
Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter:@felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas, @EmilyRPeckProduction by Max Jacobs.
Listen to Slate Money via Apple Podcasts, Overcast, Spotify, Stitcher, or Google Play.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
